description:
The presence of Raphael continues to loom over our protagonists. When Chastille`s life is endangered, Zagan offers her shelter. However, she quickly finds herself struggling to get used to life in the castle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Se mêler des affaires d’un chevalier saint est une très mauvaise idée
Seikishi no Jijou wa Dorodoro Shite Iru no de Kakawaritakunai no Da ga
The Angelic Knight Situation Sounds Like a Mess I`d Rather Not Get Involved In
聖騎士の事情はドロドロしているので関わりたくないのだが
